channel.title: Learning Path on The Shubham Co
channel.description: Recent content in Learning Path on The Shubham Co

item.title: Introduction to Multithreading
item.description: Understand the basics of multithreading in Java — what threads are, how they work, advantages, disadvantages, and real-world applications.

item.title: Creating Threads in Java
item.description: Learn how to create threads using Thread, Runnable, Callable, and Future — along with best practices for scalable, maintainable, and efficient multithreading in Java.

item.title: Why Java?
item.description: Understand why Java was created, explore its key features, and see why Java continues to be one of the most important programming languages today.

item.title: Evolution Of Java
item.description: Understand the evolution of java over the years

item.title: Features Of Java
item.description: Explore the key features of Java that make it simple, secure, portable, and powerful — the foundations of modern application development.

item.title: Programming Paradigms in Java
item.description: Learn about the major programming paradigms and how Java supports multiple paradigms.

item.title: Java Virtual Machine (JVM)
item.description: Understand how the JVM executes Java programs — covering class loading, bytecode interpretation, JIT compilation, and memory management.

item.title: Java Development Kit (JDK) & Java Runtime Environment (JRE)
item.description: Learn how the JDK, JRE, and JVM form the foundation of Java’s runtime environment — covering their components, roles, and interactions in program execution.

item.title: Setting Up the Development Environment (Installing JDK and an IDE)
item.description: Setting Up the Development Environment (Installing JDK and an IDE)
